title: New Year's Eve Live: Nashville's Big Bash
overview: Originating from downtown Nashville across multiple locations, the star-studded special will be packed with high-energy performances celebrating the excitement and anticipation of a new year.Music City has built an outstanding reputation for throwing the most musical New Year's celebration and country's biggest party. The five-hour celebration features nearly 50 performances from locations across the city, including the mainstage in Nashville's Bicentennial Capitol Mall State Park. The broadcast will cross multiple time zones, with the traditional countdown at midnight ET, culminating with the renowned Nashville Music Note Drop and fireworks at midnight CT.
